title: Monster Noises - Volume one
description: 34 Monster Noises, 5 Magic Spells, 5 Medieval Weapons for your game!
longDescription:
Hello!


This pack has 34 monster sounds for your game, plus you get 10 bonus sound effects! This is the list of everything you will take when investing in this pack:


20 Main Monster noises


  1. monster_attack_v1
  2. monster_attack_v2
  3. monster_attack_v3
  4. monster_attack_v4
  5. monster_attack_v5
  6. monster_roar_v1
  7. monster_roar_v2
  8. monster_roar_v3
  9. monster_roar_v4
  10. monster_roar_v5
  11. monster_roar_v6
  12. monster_scream_v1
  13. monster_scream_v2
  14. monster_scream_v3
  15. monster_scream_v4
  16. monster_scream_v5
  17. monster_alien_v1
  18. monster_alien_v2
  19. monster_alien_v3
  20. monster_alien_v4
  21. monster_alien_v5
  22. monster_alien_v6
  23. monster_alien_v7
  24. monster_dying_v1
  25. monster_dying_v2
  26. monster_dying_v3
  27. monster_dying_v4
  28. monster_dying_v5
  29. Tiny_monster_v1
  30. Tiny_monster_v2
  31. Tiny_monster_v3
  32. Tiny_monster_v4
  33. Tiny_monster_v5
  34. Tiny_monster_v6


5 Bonus Magic Spells


  1. Hastespell
  2. HolySpell
  3. ThunderSpell
  4. firespell
  5. DarkMatterSpell


5 Bonus Medieval Weapons


  1. Mace
  2. Axe
  3. Bowshot
  4. crossbow
  5. trebuchet



CHECK THE PREVIEW

CHECK THE DOCUMENTATION


Here's two good news:

1 - Every sound effect comes with at least 2 variations, which you'll get absolutely free!

2 - Also this pack will be updated constantly, and you will have the updates for free from the moment of purchase


License:

non-exclusive license – you’re free to use these packs in your commercial games. No license to remix or claim as your own work.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 132 (102 from monster, 30 from bonus)

Number of Audio Cues: 132 (102 from monster, 30 from bonus)

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Here

Important/Additional Notes: The font used is Ghoulish free distributed for commecial use by 1001 fonts and the image on the backgorund is free distributed for commercial use by Pixabay
